CiscoIPPhoneText.Title: KIOYDIOLABS.org - CXSPBPR
CiscoIPPhoneText.Text:
Service Help ---------------- "Environmental" : Used to view air quality and weather information by looking up a city name.
"OASA Services" : Used to view arrival times for buses in Greece by looking up a stop code.
"Other Tools" : Contains 2 tools : "XMAS Countdown" : Countdown until Christmas 2023 "Stocks" : Used to pull stock info.
"Games" : Contains a Rock Paper Scissors game.
